paragraph_1: ^Looking upon the king <color=#70e2fe> Cobalt</color> can't help but imagine themself in the king's place, and all the riches the title of ruler could entail. Thus, the dragon decides to offer the king a deal.

^<color=#70e2fe> Cobalt</color> offers to spare the king's life, in exchange for the throne. The king seems to calculate his chances before shaking <color=#70e2fe> Cobalt</color>s hand and trading his crown for <color=#70e2fe> Cobalt</color>s large bag of money.
^<color=#70e2fe> Cobalt</color> takes a seat on the throne, excited about all of the new taxes they are gonna instate!
^ Oh this is gonna be good!
